Data Protection and Remote Access

This section covers FISMA metrics around data protection and remote access (2.11, 2.11.1).




Data Protection and Remote Access

2.11 Number of Systems from Metric 1.1 that require all users (100% privileged and 100% unprivileged) to authenticate using a two-factor PIV credential or other NIST credential.

Why is Metric 2.11 important?

Issuing the appropriate credentials to user populations is meaningless unless agencies require the use of these credentials. Improper authentication of credentials may put an agency at risk.

Feedback? Create an issue on the code repository or email us at icam@gsa.gov.
